title: Spacemen 0.91 Alpha Windows
description:
Spacemen 0.91 Alpha Windows
---------------------------

Spacemen is an indie 4X space game with shooter, sim and RPG elements.

This is an Alpha version, so you might encounter bugs or misses.
Also no features are missing except a time limit of 15 days.
You can delete the user home Spacemen data folder: [userhome]/Spacemen
folder and this will reset the time limit.

CONTROLS
--------

- Commands
F1 - Map
F2 - Free movement
F3 - Goto (with target selected)
F4 - Dock (with target selected)
F5 - Orbit (in orbit range)
F6 - Scan
F7 - Messages
F8 - Hired pilots' orders
F9 - Skills
F10 - Help
F12 - Exit
ESC - Options/Cancel
Enter - Chat/OK

- Ship movement
W - Speed up
S - Speed down
SPACE - Thruster
Z - Engine kill
O - Engine on, speed zero (numeric zero)
X - FTL jump
R - Retro braking
F - Take off booster (when landed)

- Combat
MouseLEFT - Select target
MouseRIGHT - Fire
MouseMiddle - Fire missiles
LCtrl - Drop mine

- Ship orientation
Q - Roll left
E - Roll right
A - Strafe left
D - Strafe right
C - Toggle free camera

- Fixed camera
MouseX - Yaw
MouseY - Pitch

- Free camera
MouseXY - camera rotate (MouseLEFT pressed)

- Misc
L - Toggle headlight
J - Toggle compass
H - Toggle HUD
B - Build
T - Tractor loot
PgDn - Previous target
PgUp - Next target

- Map
TAB - Toggle System/Universe map
MouseLEFT - Select target
F3 - Go to
R - Rename
G - Toggle grid
L - Map labels
S - Map symbols

INSTALLATION
------------

If this is NOT the first version you are running, delete the [HOME]/Spacemen
folder prior to the first launch, in order to avoid bugs!
For example for Windows 7: C:UsersYourNameSpacemen

Enjoy!
